title: Beautiful Plagiarism

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: Even if—especially if—that story is partially plagiarized from other minds.
dialogue.context: Accepting the borrowed nature of identity

scene_context: In a store of mirrors showing reflections of others, the Architect embraces the truth—our stories work not despite being borrowed but because of it.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
